ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Playing Where's Waldo in Shar Vahl
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Thunder Cat  To:  Sent: Monday, February 24, 2003 9:45 AM Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Playing
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: "Thunder Cat" <Thunder_Cat_4283@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, February 24, 2003 9:45 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Playing Where's Waldo in Shar Vahl


> You wouldn't believe the number of people who have asked for help finding
> the Registrar in Shar Vahl. It's hard to explain where she is, but I will
> try. Lets start with the bridge that leads to the thicket zone, not the
> hollow... there are two bridges. Standing on the bridge to the thicket,
run
> into the city. Pass the black female vender - do NOT turn left or right,
go
> straight past her. Then turn right. There is a little passage that looks
> like a tunnel. Go through that. You will then turn up in a little market
> square. The Registrar is in one of the rooms in the square. I know it's
> confusing, but that is the best way I can explain it. Let me know if you
> need any more help.
Actually..you missed a little...you don't even turn right after going by
her...the Regsitrar is in the building straight ahead through the unmarked
door. Thats what confuses a bunch of people, that a worker for the local
goverment is working in an unmarked building that is for the
people....everyone else is in very visible buildings...))

> As for my favorite race and class to play... well, my main is a druid, but
I
> like to do a little fighting as well. I am also fond of pets and being
able
> to turn myself into another form. Because there is no class that does all
of
> that, I can't say I have a favorite. I enjoy my beastlord though. I can't
> say what my favorite race is either... halflings are adorable, but I also
> like Vah Shirs. However, I can't wait for Frogloks to come out!

I play Vah Shir a lot and have that city memorized very well. But will be
playing the frogs when they come out. If anyone needs info on where a
certain NPC in Shar Vahl is, send me an email and i'll let you know where
you can find them. That city gets way too confusing for a lot of people.


---
